title: Expected Number: Mean Chimpanzees
question_text:
Chimpanzees love bananas and also love to fight over them. A chimpanzee has a $5$% chance of being able to eat a banana before another chimpanzee steals it from him.
Assuming the chimpanzees are independent of one another, how many chimpanzees do we expect it takes for one to finally eat a banana?
solution:
This is a geometric distribution as this problem meets the geometric requirements.
